SEO_TITLE: Christ's Portfolio - Web Developer and Programmer
SEO_DESCRIPTION: Hire Christ to build your web or mobile application. Web Developer specializing in creating innovative applications.

ABOUT.TITLE: About me
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION_1: My name is Christopher, but they call me CJ. I love focusing on design to provide the best user experience.
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION_2: Among my achievements, I highlight that during my Higher Education studies, I helped my classmates delve deeper into database learning. I firmly believe in their relevance and enjoy sharing my knowledge about them.
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION_3: I have experience in managing collaborative projects, aiming to provide practical and engaging solutions to enhance user experience in various areas.

EXPERIENCE_1.DESCRIPTION: Developed and maintained personal and simulated web projects. Participated in hackathons, contributed to open-source projects, and created full-stack applications as part of my training and professional development.

EXPERIENCIE_2.DESCRIPTION: Managed the installation, configuration, and administration of IT equipment, optimized inventory, and resolved 100% of reported issues, improving on-site support quality.

EXPERIENCIE_3.DESCRIPTION: Provided technical support, performed system maintenance, managed networks, administered equipment, and resolved technical issues both in-person and remotely.
